title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8117.00 - General
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17 ยง 8117.00 - General

State Regulations
(a) [Eff. until

March 11, 1992, see also subd. (a) below.] Route 30A. Route 30A between the Fulton-Montgomery county line and

Route 30 in the Cities of Gloversville and Johnstown, and the Towns of

Johnstown and Mayfield. (a) [Eff. March 11, 1992, see also subd. (a) above.] Route 30A. Route 30A between the Fulton-Montgomery county line and

Route 30 in the Cities of Gloversville and Johnstown and the Towns of Johnstown
and Mayfield. (b) South Kingsboro

Avenue between Route 30A and Hales Mills Road Extension in the City of

Gloversville and the Town of Johnstown. (c) Route 67 between Route 30A and the

Montgomery-Fulton county line in the City of Johnstown and the Town of

Johnstown. (d) [Eff. until March
11, 1992, see also subd. (d) below.] Route 30. Route 30 between the

Montgomery-Fulton county line and Route 30A in the Towns of Perth, Broadalbin
and Mayfield. (d) [Eff. March 11, 1992, see also subd. (d) above.] Route 30. Route 30 between the

Montgomery-Fulton county line and Route 30A in the Towns of Perth and

Mayfield. (e) [Eff. until March 9, 1994, see also subd. (e) below.] Route 29. Route 29 between Route 30A and South

Second Avenue in the City of Johnstown and the Towns of Johnstown, Mayfield and

Broadalbin and the Village of Broadalbin. (e) [Eff. March 9, 1994, see also subd. (e)
above.] Route 29. Route 29 between Route 30A and Saratoga-Fulton county line in
the City of Johnstown, Towns of Johnstown, Mayfield and Broadalbin and the

Village of Broadalbin. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 17
ยง
8117.00

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
